attributes.action: Ask Her Majesty to disolve parliment as we the British people no longer have faith in the Rt Hon G Brown and his Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ask Her Majesty to disolve parliment as we the British people no longer have faith in the Rt Hon G Brown and the labour party as HM's Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
